com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.util

Class MessageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.util.MessageHelper

  • public class MessageHelper
extends Object
    This class offers some helper methods for handling ServiceRequest and ServiceResponse messages.

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectType

        public static ObjectType getObjectType(ConsumerMember consumer)
        Returns the ObjectType of the given ConsumerMember object. The object type is member if subsystem code is not defined. If subsystem code is defined, the object type is subsystem.
        Parameters:
        consumer - the ConsumerMember object which ObjectType needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        ObjectType of the given ConsumerMember, member or subsystem

      • getObjectType

        public static ObjectType getObjectType(ProducerMember producer)
        Returns the ObjectType of the given ProducerMember object. The object type is central service if member class is not defined. If member class is defined, the object type is service.
        Parameters:
        producer - the ProducerMember object which ObjectType needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        ObjectType of the given ProducerMember, central service or service

      • generateId

        public static String generateId()
        Generates a universally unique identifier and returns it as a string.
        Returns:
        universally unique identifier as a string

      • strToInt

        public static int strToInt(String source)
        Parses the string argument as a signed decimal integer. If parsing of the string fails, zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        source - a String containing the int representation to be parsed
        Returns:
        the integer value represented by the argument in decimal

      • strToBool

        public static boolean strToBool(String source)
        Converts the given string to boolean. The comparison is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        source - boolean value as a string
        Returns:
        boolean value
